Package game

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Field
  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Field on a hexagonal board. It has information about the Marble located on it. It is implemented in 3 coordinate system which also uses indexes as protocol requires.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Field​(int x, int y)
      Creates a Field with x and y coordinates.
      Field​(Field field)
      Second constructor of Field.
